NegativeFishingOutcomeDef.letterText: While reaching out for {PAWN_possessive} catch, {PAWN_nameDef} was bitten by a snapping tadpole!\n\nThe the fish was lost in the commotion.

Reeling in {PAWN_possessive} catch after a fierce battle with what {PAWN_pronoun} presumed to be a fish, {PAWN_nameDef} came face to face with a very angry giant snaptoad froglet!\n\nThe maddened animal turned manhunter and will try and hunt your colonists until it becomes exhausted.
